Keyed
@Entity
public class PDFFileMetadata
extends FileMetadata

Contains PDF specific metadata on top of that stored in FileMetadata

Constructor Detail

PDFFileMetadata

private PDFFileMetadata()
Creates a new empty object. This is here so that Hibernate can fill in all the data. Use the other constructor instead

PDFFileMetadata

public PDFFileMetadata(java.lang.String path)
Creates a new for the contents on disk with default initialization for the other fields. This gets a primary key for this object, so there should be an open transaction

Parameters:
path - the path to the file contents residing on disk

PDFFileMetadata

public PDFFileMetadata(java.util.Date date,
                       int timesOpened,
                       java.lang.String path,
                       java.util.Set<Tag> fileTags)
Creates a new PDFFileMetadata, initialized with the given arguments

Parameters:
date - the last time file was opened
timesOpened - the number of times it has been opened
path - the path to the contents on disk
fileTags - the tags that should be applied already (NOT copied)
